Updates for iPhone X
Updates for iPhone X
Updates for iPhone X

DynaMed Plus 2.4 aims to make it easier for you to find and get to the information you need. With this build we have:

 • Improved search results for all searches while online. 
 • Added quick access buttons to topic categories, calculators and bookmarks/history to the home screen.
 • Improved topic navigation with section tracking while browsing and direct access to subsections from the sections list.
 • Added background content updating to ensure you always have access to the most recent information even if you need to be offline.
 • Increased the number of locally stored search results for more accurate offline searches.

* New Online Only installation: Reduces the size needed for application.  Internet connection required.
* Access Recent Updates and filter by viewing history or practice changing status.
* Improved initial install experience. With instant access you can use the app while offline content is installed in the background.
* While browsing a topic, more space to view topic content is available by hiding headers and footers while reading.
* Bug fixes and stability improvements.

Bug fixes and enhancements
Bug fixes and enhancements
Bug fixes and enhancements

• Practice Changing Updates via Push Notifications:  See Practice Changing Updates based on the content you have bookmarked
• Updated Download Process: We've updated our language to include notifications around progress download completion and when you can go safely offline.
• Bug fixes and stability improvements.

Our latest update brings exciting, new features:
• Search in 15 languages (online only)
• In-app review to easily send your feedback to the DynaMed Team
• Content features including Clinicians' Practice Points, Evidence Synopsis, and DynaMed Commentary for quicker answers at the point of care
• Bug fixes and stability improvements
